Polar Vantage V2 Shift Edition
Professional premium multi-sport watch
READ MORE
The Polar Vantage V2 SHIFT™ Edition is a new way to update the look of Polar's flagship model. With the innovative SHIFT™ Edition adapters, you can change the look of the Vantage V2.
It comes with 2 bracelets: an FKM (fluoroelastomer) strap that feels and looks great during the toughest workouts, and a perforated leather strap with stylish details for a more sophisticated look and everyday use of the watch.
This watch is compatible with Polar H9, Polar H10 chest sensors

client feedback

Rosie Green
2 half marathons
I did not know what to buy for myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that suited my goals and financial capabilities. After some time I decided to update my gadget, and I did not hesitate to contact them.

New goals - new gadget!

Thank you, RunSmart!
Alex Walker
1 half marathon
It's a cool thing, a heart rate monitor. I used to run without one. Turns out I was only making things worse for myself. I bought a heart rate monitor and also got a workout as a gift. I had my first workout together, and they taught me how to use the new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy and made a training plan for the month ahead.

Got ready for my first half marathon with them! Thank you!!!
Grace Robinson
2 half marathons
For a long time I could not start running, because I had started several times before, but it got hard and I quit. I heard about RunSmart and heart rate-controlled running from friends and decided to give it a try.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and picked up a very interesting option at a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! I've already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and have no intention of stopping!

Thank you!!!
PhysioPLUS, 22 Chesnut Grove, Fleet, Hampshire. GU51 3LW
